_aiInstructions: AI: This tool is published on npm. Use 'npx notion-ai-tasks' to run commands. Read AI_GUIDELINES.md for task structure templates. Adapt content based on task type (Bug/Feature/Documentation/Refactoring). Use appropriate sections and checklists for each type. CRITICAL: ALWAYS use 'npx notion-ai-tasks get <task-id>' to retrieve task specs, NEVER use WebFetch for Notion URLs. If task specs cannot be retrieved, STOP the process immediately. MANDATORY: IMMEDIATELY after getting task specs, update task status to 'In Progress' with 'npx notion-ai-tasks update <task-id> -s "In Progress"'. Update todos as you complete them during development.
